channel.title: Version 4.2 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 4.2.0 (2022-06-23) Break'n Break'n Th' second parameter fer th' include shortcode was switched 'n mean'n an' was renamed from showfirsthead'n t' hidefirsthead'n. If ye haven’t used this parameter 'n yer shortcode, th' default behavior hasn’t changed an' ye don’t need t' change anyth'n.
